name: Search and Rescue: Find the Pilot
name_original: Search and Rescue: Find the Pilot
description:
Controls:

Move - WASD and Arrow Keys

Release a bogey - Space or B

Point of Game:

The Point of the game is to find a stranded pilot that has just crashed. You can use a bogey to help you track where you have been and it will warn you if the pilot or any debris has drifted near it. You have only so much time to find the pilot, so good luck!

Developer Comments:

This game might have a bug or two, an example would be that the exit button doesn't work. I ended up in a rush with only 15 minutes left when I submit. Unity crashed, a couple of times,  so I struggled a bit.  In all, I spent 8 and a half hours on this game over 24 hours.
